properties.positive-fee-after-grace: After the grace period ends, the flashloan fee must be positive.
properties.zero-fee-during-grace: Before the grace period ends, the flashloan fee is zero.
properties.fee-received-after-grace: After the grace period ends, feeRecipient receives the fee.
properties.shares-eq-assets: The total shares is equal to the total assets.
properties.shares-leq-assets: The total shares is less equal than the total assets.
